review: I am really happy after consultation. Doctor explained about problem and solution. Really good and hygienic clinic ..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
My father has been Dr. Sahoo's patient for a while, so he came highly recommended. I needed an emergency tooth extraction and dental filling, along with scaling - he did all of these in only two sittings, with me spending less than an hour in total inside his chamber. He's quite understanding, offering his advice in a calm, friendly, and non-judgmental manner. 

His surgical skills are fantastic. Having heard from other friends about how much they bled during scaling, I was quite apprehensive. He spoke to me through the process and completed the entire thing in 10-12 minutes with no pain sensation and surprisingly minimal bleeding. 

I recommend him most enthusiastically.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Doctor Sanjay Sahoo for my wisdom tooth extraction surgery. I must admit, he is one of the best doctors I have consulted. Not only does he attend his patients diligently but also takes time to explain them the issue. The tooth extraction surgery was extremely smooth and the I am glad that I recovered fully in just a matter of a week. He keeps providing his support even after the consultation, which I feel is really good. I would highly suggest him for any sort of dental issues without any second thoughts.

Firstly i want to say the doctors behaviour is good. My mother had severe tooth pain so i came to the doctor and he gaved my mother the best treatment. It was great experience and the clinic is too near from my house so i like to recommend others Also to definetely come to the doctor . thank you.

review: I was searching for a very good, caring, and efficient young  dentist who has a very good academic career as well. I prefer young dentist because I heard that dentistry has developed a lot in recent years. Dr. Sanjoy Sahoo ticks all the boxes. He is skilled, caring, efficien** ************* young dentist who is passed out from Government College too. The very first day, I was impressed with his approach towards my problem. He explained the causes and treatment line very lucidly. Right now, I am undergoing Orthodontic treatment (braces) for spacing problem of my teeth. My sister is also getting the braces and we both are very happy with this dental clinic. Lastly, the cost of treatment is really very reasonable.

  My Auntie got dental implants with complete denture which is excellent both aesthetically as well as functionally.
